Subject: Re: Re:Gladiators

You know maybe this guy is right. I believe an episode of the simpsons would some this up quite nicely:

Is it wrong to steal a loaf of bread for your starving family?
-Duh.. No
Say you have a large starving family. Is it wrong to steal a truckload of bread to feed them?
-Duh.. No
Now say your family doesnt like bread... They like... Gladiators! Would it be wrong to give it to them?
-Duh.. Guess Not.
Now keeping in mind that you can pay for all this, is it ok to take it for free because your a cheap bastard?
-Of Course!
Well I'm glad we agree on one thing. Bastard.
<Insert .WAV file of gun firing.>

--Trahern
